items.name: Ekpe Festival
items.description: A vibrant annual festival showcasing the rich cultural heritage of Uyo, featuring colorful displays and traditional performances.

items.name: The Amalgamation House
items.description: A historic site where the amalgamation of Northern and Southern Nigeria was declared in 1914.

items.name: National Museum of Colonial History
items.description: A museum housing artifacts and relics from Nigeria’s colonial era, offering insights into the country’s historical development.

items.name: Ibom Plaza
items.description: A bustling plaza with an open theater, shopping areas, and a double-rolled water fountain, serving as a hub for social and commercial activities.

items.name: Godswill Akpabio International Stadium
items.description: A world-class stadium hosting football matches, concerts, and major sporting events in Nigeria.

items.name: Le Méridien Hotel and Resort
items.description: A luxurious hotel offering premium accommodations, fine dining, and recreational facilities for visitors.

items.name: Orun Museum
items.description: A museum dedicated to preserving the cultural artifacts and traditions of the Ibibio people.

items.name: Ibom Tropicana Entertainment Mall
items.description: A modern entertainment complex featuring a shopping mall, cinema, and amusement park.
